name: Standard combat tests
description: A set of standardized character loadouts, meant to aid in combat balance testing.  Disables all other professions/scenarios!

name: Evacuee
description: You have survived the initial wave of panic, and took the time to fabricate some improvised weaponry.  It will come in handy.

name: Scavenger
description: You carved out a living in the Apocalypse, but are still far from thriving - your gear is scavenged from the old world instead of custom-made.

name: Survivor
description: You already forgot the world before - your gear is made with the horrors of the present in mind, and you have the skills to use it.
